title: Wrong IP
body: League has been showing the wrong number of ip for me for months. its about 500 ip off.

replies.body:
I'm having the same problem

Its not just a random happening that its off by an exact amount, and I've used the legacy client lately, this did not fix it. It adds the wrong amount of IP after every game constantly. I've reported the bug already. Its grossly multiplied by like 3-4 times the amount received but its a false amount, restarting the client sets it back to the correct amount in the top right corner of the client but after a game it adds to much again.

We typically see these You should be able to resolve this and update your balance by swapping over to the Legacy Client from login. Can you let me know if it works for you?
